h1.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-image: initial; background-position: 0px 0px; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; font-size: 34px; line-height: 60px; text-transform: capitalize; font-family: AmericanGotURW-Bol; font-weight: 600;

span.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

h3.style: text-transform: capitalize; color: rgb(50, 61, 73); background: 0px 0px rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; font-size: 28px; line-height: 1.30435em; font-family: AmericanGotURW-Bol;

section.class: o_gallery s_image_gallery bg-white o_grid o_spc-big pb40

span.style: color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 15px;

p.span: Launched in 2018, the SPS Capital Equipment Division was created to complement our disposable goods services by offering customers solutions for their used medical equipment. This reinforces our mission to provide cost-saving solutions for healthcare facilities across the United States who choose to save money without sacrificing quality of care.

h3.style: text-transform: capitalize; color: rgb(50, 61, 73); background: 0px 0px rgb(255, 255, 255); border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; font-size: 28px; line-height: 1.30435em; font-family: AmericanGotURW-Bol; text-align: right;

span.style: color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; text-align: right;

p.span: Reductions in reimbursements for health care services drive the need for cost savings from every angle. We, at SPS, can provide you with solutions to return revenue to your facility by purchasing your used, depreciated medical equipment. If you’re a buyer, we remarket our equipment and provide it to you at a reduced cost, saving healthcare facilities thousands.  Equipment that is older technology, but still valued in other countries, is donated to medical missions, therefore supporting sustainability in 2nd and 3rd world markets. Let us find cost savings solutions that work for you.

h3.style: text-transform: capitalize; color: rgb(50, 61, 73); background-image: initial; background-position: 0px 0px; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; font-size: 28px; line-height: 1.30435em; font-family: AmericanGotURW-Bol;

p.style: background-image: initial; background-position: 0px 0px; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: "Open Sans", sans-serif; font-size: 15px; line-height: 26px;

div.p: When selling us your equipment, we evaluate your used equipment by looking at the following factors:

ul.style: background-image: initial; background-position: 0px 0px; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; border: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px; list-style-position: inside; color: rgb(50, 61, 73); font-family: Lato, sans-serif; font-size: 15px;

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

ul.li: Age of the equipment:  We offer the most value for items that are less than 10 years old.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

ul.li: Condition of the equipment: We look at the physical condition (overall health of the internal and external parts and attachments) and the cosmetic condition (visible signs of wear, tear, defects, and damage).

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

ul.li: Age of the technology: We look at where the equipment stands in comparison to the state-of-the-art technology on the market.

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;
background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

ul.li: The difficulty of re-installation, sales service, and sales support

li.style: background: 0px 0px; border: 0px; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; vertical-align: baseline; outline: 0px;

ul.li: The overall demand of the product: Is it equipment that will sell quickly, or will it be put into storage?

div.h3: You Can Be Assured That You Will Receive:
